helpModal.title: How to Play
helpModal.rulesPoint1: Objective: To leave as few pegs on the board as possible.
helpModal.rulesPoint2: To make a move, click on a peg to select it.
helpModal.rulesPoint3: A selected peg must jump over an adjacent peg into an empty hole immediately on the other side.
helpModal.rulesPoint4: The peg that was jumped over is removed from the board.
helpModal.levelUpDescription: To unlock the next level, you must finish the game with 3 or fewer pegs remaining. When you earn a rank of 'Cunning', 'Intelligent', or 'Genius', the next level will become available.
helpModal.replayDescription: Once you have unlocked a level and earned its specific achievement badge, you can return to play that level again at any time from the 'Select Level' menu.

genius.name: Genius
genius.description: Prove your genius by leaving only 1 peg.

cunning.description: Use your cunning, leave only 3 pegs.

inexperienced.description: Finished with 6 pegs, you need more practice.
